text: General elections were held in Niue on 6 May 2017.Niue IFES ==Electoral system== The 20 members of the Assembly are elected by two methods; 14 are elected from single-member consistencies and six are elected from a single nationwide constituency. Both types of seat use first-past-the-post voting. ==Results== ===Nationwide seats=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Candidate !Votes !Notes |- |align=left|O'Love
